lead_paragraph: Slaven Bilic plays guitar, speaks several languages and is a qualified lawyer, but the West Ham United manager wants to add poetry to his skills so he can wax lyrical about midfielder Dimitri Payet's performances this season.

headline.print_headline: West Ham's Payet Brings Out Bilic's Inner Poet
headline.main: West Ham's Payet Brings Out Bilic's Inner Poet

snippet: Slaven Bilic plays guitar, speaks several languages and is a qualified lawyer, but the West Ham United manager wants to add poetry to his skills so he can wax lyrical about midfielder Dimitri Payet's performances this season....
